title: Osprey Raptor Pro adds flexible D3O Back Protector for 2022 hydration pack
content:
Osprey already offers some of the best hydration packs out there. But there’s always room for improvement. For the popular Raptor, that includes the addition of a D30 BP4 Level 1 back guard. Meaning Osprey’s new Raptor Pro pack may be the brand’s most comprehensive option to date. The Raptor Pro bike ($200 MSRP) pack […]

The post Osprey Raptor Pro adds flexible D3O Back Protector for 2022 hydration pack appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jilli Cluff
